children.text: Valencia in talks with Zaza & Hernanes
Valencia has started conversations with Zaza & Hernanes, even though both players missed out on their last match.
Man Utd & Arsenal in Brahimi chase

Manchester United, Arsenal and Manchester City are among those keeping a close eye on Porto midfielder Yacine Brahimi, but Juventus, Napoli, AC Milan, Monaco, Marseille, Atletico Madrid, Sevilla and West Ham are also keen.
